name: Stay In Hell
description:
"Let them run but don't let them escape!"

Stay in Hell is a strategy game where you play as the Hell Keeper, preventing the sinners from escaping to heaven by putting various obstacles with different effects. Good luck on keeping them!

How to play:

Developed by: Team goes BRRR

Biggy Asmara - Producer, UI/UX Designer

Ricky Arebin - Programmer

Rico M. Faris - Game Designer

Rifkie N. Putra - 2D Artist

All third parties assets that have been used in the game have been credited respectively during the credit scene.
